record.SQL_STATEMENT: SELECT§§ s.shop_id,§§ s.shop_desc,§§ s.sale_article_id,§§ s.code,§§ s.description,§§ s.group_level_1_id,§§ s.group_level_2_id,§§ s.group_level_3_id,§§ s.group_level_4_id,§§ s.group_level_5_id,§§ s.group_level_1_desc,§§ s.group_level_2_desc,§§ s.group_level_3_desc,§§ s.group_level_4_desc,§§ s.group_level_5_desc,§§ s.vat,§§ s.vat_percent,§§ s.meas_unit,§§ SUM(s.quantity) AS quantity,§§ SUM(s.discount) AS discount,§§ SUM(s.promotion_discount) AS promotion_discount,§§ SUM(s.quantity)*AVG(s.price) AS row_price,§§ SUM(s.row_total_price) AS row_total_price,§§ SUM(s.row_vat_round) AS row_vat,§§ SUM(s.net_row_price_round) AS net_row_price,§§ SUM(s.quantity)*AVG(s.cost) AS row_cost_old,§§ SUM(s.quantity * s.cost) AS row_cost,§§ ssf_margin(SUM(s.net_row_price),SUM(s.quantity)*AVG(s.cost)) AS row_margin_old,§§ ssf_margin(SUM(s.net_row_price),SUM(s.quantity * s.cost)) AS row_margin§§FROM§§ ssv_sale_reports_round s§§WHERE§§ s.accounting_date >= :start_date AND§§ s.accounting_date <= :end_date AND§§ s.shop_id = :shop_id AND§§ s.pos_id = :pos_id AND§§ s.sale_type_id = :sale_type_id AND§§ s.sale_causal_id = :sale_causal_id AND§§ s.customer_id = :customer_id AND§§ s.operator_id = :t_operator_id AND§§ s.reference_id = :reference_id AND§§ s.seller_id = :seller_id AND§§ s.sale_article_id = :sale_article_id AND§§ s.deleted = 0 AND§§ s.annulled = 0 AND§§ s.exclude_on_statistics = :exclude AND§§ s.detail_deleted = 0 AND§§ s.row_type IN (2,3,5,6)§§GROUP BY§§ s.shop_id,§§ s.shop_desc,§§ s.sale_article_id,§§ s.code,§§ s.description,§§ s.group_level_1_id,§§ s.group_level_2_id,§§ s.group_level_3_id,§§ s.group_level_4_id,§§ s.group_level_5_id,§§ s.group_level_1_desc,§§ s.group_level_2_desc,§§ s.group_level_3_desc,§§ s.group_level_4_desc,§§ s.group_level_5_desc,§§ s.vat,§§ s.vat_percent,§§ s.meas_unit§§ORDER BY§§ s.shop_desc,§§ s.group_level_1_desc,§§ s.group_level_2_desc,§§ s.group_level_3_desc,§§ s.group_level_4_desc,§§ s.group_level_5_desc,§§ s.code
